sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) as countValue FROM ACCOUNT,supplier,BANK WHERE ACCOUNT.ISENABLED!=0 AND supplier.supplierCode=ACCOUNT.supplierCode AND ACCOUNT.BANKCODE=BANK.BANKCODE AND ( locate(#accountNumber#,ACCOUNT.ACCOUNTNUMBER)>0 OR locate(#accountCode#,ACCOUNTCODE)>0 OR locate(#accountType#,ACCOUNTTYPE)>0 OR locate(#supplierName#,supplier.supplierName)>0 OR locate(#bankName#,BANK.BANKNAME)>0)

SELECT ACCOUNTCODE, ACCOUNTNUMBER, ACCOUNTTYPE, ACCOUNT.supplierCode, supplier.supplierName, ACCOUNT.BANKCODE, BANK.BANKNAME FROM ACCOUNT,supplier,BANK WHERE ACCOUNT.ISENABLED!=0 AND supplier.supplierCode=ACCOUNT.supplierCode AND ACCOUNT.BANKCODE=BANK.BANKCODE AND ( locate(#accountNumber#,ACCOUNT.ACCOUNTNUMBER)>0 OR locate(#accountCode#,ACCOUNTCODE)>0 OR locate(#accountType#,ACCOUNTTYPE)>0 OR locate(#supplierName#,supplier.supplierName)>0 OR locate(#bankName#,BANK.BANKNAME)>0) limit #startValue#,#endValue#

SELECT ACCOUNTCODE, ACCOUNTNUMBER, ACCOUNTTYPE, ACCOUNT.supplierCode, supplier.supplierName, ACCOUNT.BANKCODE, BANK.BANKNAME FROM ACCOUNT,supplier,BANK WHERE ACCOUNT.ISENABLED=1 AND supplier.supplierCode=ACCOUNT.supplierCode AND ACCOUNT.BANKCODE=BANK.BANKCODE AND ACCOUNT.ACCOUNTCODE=#accountCode#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET ACCOUNTNUMBER=#accountNumber#, ACCOUNTTYPE=#accountType#, supplierCode=#supplierCode#, BANKCODE=#bankCode#, ISENABLED=1 WHERE ACCOUNTCODE=#accountCode#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET ISENABLED=0 WHERE ACCOUNTCODE=#accountCode#
